## MatrixShape type

A tuple representing the shape of a [Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->. The first entry is the number of rows, and the second entry is the number of columns.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MatrixShape = [number, number];
```
